ID: 2071
Title: [Bug]: update 返回影响行数不对 || [Bug]: The number of affected rows returned by update is incorrect.
Description:
<img width="854" alt="image" src="https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/54e644cd-280d-4a1e-8444-3e102d55b241">
当字段中有on 关键字时，会无判断为ON DUPLICATE KEY 语法，其实不是
<!--This is a translation content dividing line, the content below is generated by machine, please do not modify the content below-->
---
<img width="854" alt="image" src="https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/54e644cd-280d-4a1e-8444-3e102d55b241">
When there is the on keyword in the field, it will be judged as ON DUPLICATE KEY syntax. In fact, it is not
